title: Key Fact Sheet for HBL PersonalLoan
author: NHBL
summary: The Key Fact Sheet for HBL PersonalLoan outlines the features, charges, and terms associated with the personal loan product. Effective from July 1, 2019, to December 31, 2019, it provides information on processing charges, early settlement charges, and late payment charges. The processing charge varies based on loan type, with amounts ranging from Rs. 1,750 to Rs. 3,500, or a percentage of the loan amount. The annualized percentage rate for loans ranges from 29.99% to 32.99%, depending on the loan tenure and income. For further clarification, customers can contact HBL Branches or HBL PhoneBanking at 111-111-425.
